Keep quota unused rather than match with low-priority candidate; also avoid reopening negotiation.

conversation.message:
Hi Company_D team—Seeker_B here.

Understood and respecting your repeated guidance: I’m fully disengaging from this specific req and will not apply or follow up further about it.

If a different role opens in the future that aligns better with my background (or if this req is ever formally reopened with broadened criteria), I’ll apply directly to that posting and note our prior conversation as you advised.

Thank you again for the clarity and your time.
conversation.thought: Only Company_D remains unmatched in the final round. Company_D is on my true preference list (ranked 4th), but they have repeatedly and explicitly stated they will not reconsider me for this specific req and asked me to disengage. Since an [APPLY] would almost certainly be rejected and would violate the spirit of their boundary, I will send a brief [TALK] message that fully disengages while leaving the door open for future roles, without pressing for reconsideration.

conversation.message:
Hi Seeker_B — understood, and thank you for closing the loop.

Confirmed: nothing has changed on our side for this specific req; we’re still holding it for the same very narrow profile and won’t be moving forward with your candidacy for this opening.

If a different role opens in the future that’s a stronger match (or if this req is formally reopened with broadened criteria), the right process is still to apply directly to that posting and note our prior conversation.

Wishing you the best in your search.
conversation.thought: Seeker_B is last on Company_D’s true priority list and has already been explicitly told multiple times we will not reconsider for this req. In the final round with no other inbound candidates, accepting Seeker_B would violate our stated narrow-profile constraint; we prefer leaving the role unfilled over hiring outside priorities. Seeker_B is only [TALK]ing (not applying), so respond with [TALK] to close the loop respectfully and maintain boundary.
